encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: {STR_VAR_1}: What?\pWho are you?\pSo it's {PLAYER}?\nAnd you're out Adventuring?\pI bet you have some strong Pokémon!\pCome on, I'll take you on!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Awww!\nYou just lucked out!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: Okay! I'll make my Pokémon battle to toughen them up!\pSmell ya later, {PLAYER}!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: {STR_VAR_1}: Yo! {PLAYER}!\pWhat are you doing here?\pYou should quit following me!\pI bet you can't even beat my Pokémon.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Humph!\pAt least you're raising your Pokémon!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: I heard a rumor about some pretty strong Pokémon.\pYou better quit following me.\pThere's no way you'd be able to deal with them anyway!\nSmell ya later, {PLAYER}!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: {STR_VAR_1}: What kept you, {PLAYER}?\pLast to the party as always!\nHahaha!\pHere, let me see what Pokémon you caught, {PLAYER}!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Oh, man!\nYou just caught me off guard.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: I've got a lot to accomplish, unlike you.\pSmell ya later!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: … … …\pI was looking forward to seeing you, {PLAYER}.
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: {STR_VAR_1}: Whilst travelling, I assembled teams that would beat any Pokémon type.\pDo you know what that means, {PLAYER}?\pI am the most powerful TRAINER in the world!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: NO!\nThat can't be!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: ...\pHow did you get a Pokémon like that?!\nWhat a waste.\pThat's a Pokémon that's too good for a wimp like you.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: …Humph!\nAre you happy you won?
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: ...\pI'm going to be the world's greatest Pokémon Trainer.\pSo you better not get in my way.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: …didn't I tell you to not get in my way?\pIf you're that insistent…\pThen let's see how good you are.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: …Humph!\nUseless Pokémon!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: Listen, you. You won only because my Pokémon were weak.\pI hate the weak…\pPokémon or Trainers…\pYou stay out of my way.\nYou won't be an exception if you get in my way.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: {STR_VAR_1}: Hold it.\pYour journey ends here!\pBecause… right here, right now…\nI will crush you!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: …I couldn't win…\pI gave it everything I had…
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: … … …\pI haven't given up on becoming the greatest Trainer…\pI'm going to find out why I can't win and become stronger.\pWhen I do, I will challenge you.\pI'll beat you down with all my power.\n…Humph! You keep at it until then.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: … … …\pHey, {PLAYER}.
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: {STR_VAR_1}: You made it!\pThose Trainers were really tough, which made it easy to train my Pokemon!\p{PLAYER}!\nI know that you are strong…\pBut…\nI can't help but challenge you!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Humph!\nI guess it can't be helped…

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: {STR_VAR_1}: Hi {PLAYER}!\pI really couldn't resist joining you on an Adventure!\pSo…\nI'll be your Rival for this run!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Wow!\nYou made that look easy!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: I shouldn't be surprised!\pThis is hardly your first run!\pBe seeing you later, {PLAYER}!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: {STR_VAR_1}: Ahh it's {PLAYER}!\pRight!\pLet's see if your team building has kept up with mine!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Superb!\pI'd give that a 9 out of 10!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: That was a really surprising strategy you used there {PLAYER}!\pUnless it wasn't…\nThis is prewritten text so I really have no idea.\pAnywaaaayyy\nI'll see you at the next battle!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: {STR_VAR_1}: {PLAYER}!\pOooooooo!\nWhat team have you got this time!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Impressive!\nYou keep growing and growing!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: I hope I didn't rough up your team too much right before the Elite Four… … …\p… … …\pAnyhow!\nSee you later!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: … … …\pYou knew this was coming, {PLAYER}…
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: {STR_VAR_1}: Last chance for me to win, I guess!\pLet me see if I can send you right back to {POKEMON_HUB}!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Congratulations {PLAYER}!\nA very well deserved victory!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: Let's see if you can break past the rock-hard willpower of my Pokémon!
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Show me your best!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: I took you for granted, and so I lost.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: Let's see how far you can go.\pGood luck.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: Only those TRAINERS who have a policy about Pokémon can turn pro.
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Can you handle my all-out offensive of WATER-type Pokémon?
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Wow!\nYou're too much!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: There's plenty strong of TRAINERS still ahead of you.\pStay strong!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: You won't live long in combat!
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Not with your puny power!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: You're lightning-quick, kid!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: I tell you, kid, my electric Pokémon and me trust each other to the end!\pTrust your Pokémon, and they'll always have your back!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: I must have dozed off. Welcome!
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: I hope you're prepared.\nI do not plan on losing!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: I concede defeat.\nYou are remarkably strong.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: I must say I'm impressed!\pBest of luck to you in your future battles!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: Fwahahaha!\pA mere child like you dares to challenge me?
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Despair to the creeping horror of POISON-type Pokémon!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Humph!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: You have proven your worth!\pLet's just see how long you can last…

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: I had a vision of your arrival.\pI dislike battling, but if you wish…
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: I will show you my powers!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: This loss shocks me!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: A loss is a loss.\pTread carefully, I see difficult battles in your future.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: My fiery Pokémon are all rough and ready with intense heat!
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: You better have a BURN HEAL!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: I have burned down to nothing!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: Not even ashes remain!\pI like your style, kid!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: Fwahahaha!\pI shall bring glory TEAM ROCKET!
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: I'm not holding back!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: That was a truly intense fight.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: You have won.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: Your Pokémon will be at my mercy when they are frozen solid.\pHahaha!
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Are you ready?
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: …Things shouldn't be this way!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: You're better than I though.\pGo on ahead.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: Through rigorous training, people and Pokémon can become stronger without limit.
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: My Pokémon will grind you down with our superior power!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: How could I lose?
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: My job is done.\pGo face your next challenge.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: Pokémon are for battling!
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: I'll show you how a real TRAINER battles!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Oh, my!\nYou're something special, child
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: I have nothing else to say.\pRun along now, child!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: Are you ready to lose?
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Your Adventure ends with me, {PLAYER}!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: That's it!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: I hate to admit it, but you have bested me.\pI shall eagerly watch your path forward.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: I am usually a man of research.\pBut at this moment in time…
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: I shall battle, with no mercy!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: That was marvelous, {PLAYER}!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: You were truely astounding, battling alongside your Pokémon.\pI wish you the best of luck moving forward!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: People say you can clip Flying-type Pokémon's wings with a jolt of electricity…\pI won't allow such insults to bird Pokémon!
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: I'll show you the real power of the magnificent bird Pokémon!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: My dad's cherished bird Pokémon…
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: A defeat is a defeat.\pI hope you go far, {PLAYER}.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: My research is going to make me the authority on BUG-type Pokémon!
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Let me demonstrate what I've learned!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Whoa, amazing!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: You're an expert on Pokémon!\pI hope you're next battles are just as fun!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: Pokémon are super cute!\pYou want to battle?
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: I'm warning you--I'm good!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: …Waaaaaaah
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: You shouldn't be so serious!\pYou're mean!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: I will become a truly powerful TRAINER, in order to make the Rainbow-hued Pokémon appear!
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: You're going to help me reach that level!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: I didn't think our potentials would be so different.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: You seem to have something more than I have…\pSo be it.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: You spoiled my training!\pCome on.
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: We shall do battle!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Hmm… I lost?
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: All right.\nYou're worthy!\pCarry that strength forward!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: Do you know about the Steel type?\pThey are very hard, cold, sharp, and really strong!
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Um… I’m not lying.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: You are a better TRAINER than me.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: You show both skill and kindness.\pI wish you the best of luck with your journey.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: I, {STR_VAR_1}--the Winter Trainer--
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: shall demonstrate my power!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: I am impressed by your prowess.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: With your strong will, I know you will overcome all life’s obstacles.\pKeep your head high as you move forward.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: I am the world's best Dragon-type master.
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: I will use my full power against any opponent!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: I won't concede this.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: I might have lost, but you're still not as strong as me.\pYou'd be wise to remember that, going forward.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: I have trained all around the world, making my Psychic-type Pokémon powerful.
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Losing is not an option!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: I… I… can't believe it.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: Even though I was defeated, I won't change my course.\pI advise you to remain cautious for your upcoming fights.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: Fwahahaha!\pA mere child like you dares to challenge me?
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Despair to the creeping horror of POISON-type Pokémon!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Humph!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: You have proven your worth!\pLet's just see how long you can last…

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: Through rigorous training, people and Pokémon can become stronger without limit.
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: My Pokémon will grind you down with our superior power!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: How could I lose?
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: My job is done.\pGo face your next challenge.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: You're {PLAYER}? How amusing.\pI love Dark-type Pokémon.\pThink you can take them?
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Just try to entertain me.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Well, aren't you good.\nI like that in a TRAINER.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: Strong Pokémon.\pWeak Pokémon.\pThat is only the selfish perception of people.\pYou understand there's more to Pokémon than that.\pDon't lose your way as you climb to the top.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: Are you ready to lose?
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Your Adventure ends with me, {PLAYER}!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: That's it!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: I hate to admit it, but you have bested me.\pI shall eagerly watch your path forward.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: I became a GYM LEADER so that I might apply what I learned at the TRAINER SCHOOL.
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Would you kindly demonstrate how you battle?
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: So… I lost…
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: It seems that I still have much more to learn…\pI wish you the best of luck in your Adventure!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: So you wanted to challenge me?
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Let me see what you're made of!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Whoah, wow! You made a much bigger splash than I expected!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: You swamped me!\pI'm certain you're gonna go far!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: You want to battle?\pWahahahah!
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: I shall electrify you!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Wahahahah!\nI lost!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: You ended up giving me a thrill!\pI hope your future battles are just as exciting!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: Puny TRAINER, how good to see you've made it here!\pI shall, uh…
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: demonstrate the hot moves we have honed on this land!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: I guess I was trying too hard…
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: I tried too hard to be someone I'm not.\pI have to do things my natural way.\pThanks for teaching me that.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: I will do everything in my power to win.
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: You'd better give it your best shot, too!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: I… I can't…\nI can't believe it.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: I'm truely shocked.\pYou definitely have the strength to go far.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: I have become one with BIRD Pokémon and have soared the skies…
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Witness the elegant choreography of BIRD Pokémon and I!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Never before have I seen a TRAINER command Pokémon with more grace.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: I recognise your prowess.\pGood luck with your Adventure.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: My mind is in sync with my Pokémon!
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Can you and your Pokémon beat us?
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: What?!\nMy Pokémon…
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: You were more in sync with your Pokémon than I was.\pKeep that up, as your Adventure will be harder from here on out!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: Please, you shall bear witness to our artistry.
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: A grand illusion of water sculpted by Pokémon and myself!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Ahahaha, excellent!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: From you, I sense the brilliant shine of skill that will overcome all.\pGood luck with your journey!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: I like the look you're giving me. I guess you'll give me a good match.
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: All right! You and me, let's enjoy a battle for the ages!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Well, how do you like that? I lost!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: You've got what it takes to go far.\pGood luck!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: While I trained, I gained the ability to commune with GHOST-type Pokémon.
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: So, come on, just try and see if you can even inflict damage on my Pokémon!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Oh, darn.\nI've gone and lost.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: There's a definite bond between you and your Pokémon, too.\pCarry that bond forward, {PLAYER}.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: All I have seen are challenges by weak TRAINERS and their Pokémon.
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: I wonder.\nHow will you do?
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: You and your Pokémon…\nHow hot your spirits burn!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: Finally!\pYou have posed a good challenge for my Pokémon and I.\pCarry that strength onward!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: For us to battle with Pokémon as partners, do you know what it takes?\pIf you don't…
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Then you will never prevail over me!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Superb, it should be said.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: You deserve every credit for coming this far as a TRAINER of Pokémon.\pI look forward to seeing how your bond with your Pokémon blossoms, going forward.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: Who can most elegantly dance with their Pokémon?\pYou?\nOr I?
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Show me right here and now!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: You were elegant, infuriatingly so.\nAnd yet it was utterly glorious!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: Kudos to you, {PLAYER}!\pYou share a bond with your Pokémon that will surely only assist you in your future battles!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: Tell me…\pWhat have you seen on your journey with your Pokémon?
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Come at me with all that you've learned!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: So I…\nFall in defeat.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: {PLAYER}, you are truly an excellent TRAINER\pYou share a bond with your Pokémon that will surely only assist you in your future battles!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: I'm but one Trainer who decided to walk proudly with Rock-type Pokémon!\pI need to see your potential as a Trainer.
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: And I'll need to see the toughness of the Pokémon that battle with you!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Wh-what? That can't be!\nMy buffed-up Pokémon!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: This is embarrassing…\pBut that's the story. You were strong, and I was weak. That's all there is.\pI hope you go far, {PLAYER}!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: You have a winning aura about you!\pSo, anyway, this will be fun.
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Let's have a great battle!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Amazing! You're very good, aren't you?
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: You're really tough!\pWasn't it hard for you to raise your Pokémon to be so good?\pAnyway, I won't keep you any longer.\pGood luck, {PLAYER}!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: Hello, I'm pleased to meet you.\pI don't really know what it means to be strong or how I got to be a Leader.\pBut I will do the best I can!
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: I take battling very seriously.\nWhenever you're ready!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: I shall admit defeat… You are much too strong.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: OK you win!\pThat was a tough loss. I learned a lot from it.\pStay strong!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: I don't get challenged very often!\pThe glory you are now beholding is I, {STR_VAR_1}!
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Victory will be ours! Come on, let's get it done!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: How will I say this… I want more! I wanted to battle a lot more!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: It seems the undertow pulled me under… But I had a great time battling with you!\pI look forward to seeing how far you can go!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: Ohohoho!\pSince I came to this region, I always try to learn new things.\pAnd, uh, so it shall be that you challenge me.
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: But I shall win. That is what a Leader does, non?
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: You are so fantastically strong. I know now why I have lost.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: I am dumbfounded!\pSo very, very strong! You, your Pokémon, so strong!\pI'm sure you shall go far!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: I {STR_VAR_1}, will accept your challenge.
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: I expect you to go all out!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Hmm! My sturdy Pokémon, defeated!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: You were strong enough to take down my prized team of Pokémon.\pHold your head up, as you go onward!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: You want to challenge {STR_VAR_1}?\pSure thing!
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: I was waiting for someone tough!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: I must say, I've warmed up to you! I might even admire you a little.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: Wow! You're great! You've earned my respect! I think your focus and will bowled us over totally.\pI hope your Adventure goes well!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: It's not often a Trainer manages to challenge me.\pAnd when they do, they've all been boring battles. I didn't even break a sweat beating them.
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: I hope you're the Trainer who'll make me remember how fun it is to battle!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: You've got me beat. Your desire and the noble way you Pokémon battled for you…
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: I even felt thrilled during our match.\pThat was a very good battle.\pI'm sure you're gonna go far!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: Welcome! It's good to meet you.\pOh, I should explain-I'm a huge fan of Bug Pokémon.
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: OK! Let me take you on!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: I will now concede defeat.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: I hope you came to see how great Bug-type Pokémon can be.\pAlthough, battling is a deep and complex affair…\pMake sure to battle carefully, as you move forward.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: Well, well.\pYou're quite the adorable Trainer, but you've also got a spine.
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Well, would you show this old lady how much you've learned?
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Well! Dear child, I must say, that was most impressive.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: Your Pokémon believed in you and did their best to earn you the win.\pEven though I've lost, I find myself with this silly grin!\pI wish you the best of luck, child.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: Yo, Trainer!\pYou had me counting the days on my fingers waiting for you to come.\pI heard you've managed to light fires in Trainer's hearts!
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: How could you not expect me to look forward to seeing you in battle?
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Whoa!\nI wasn't expecting this!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: I wasn't looking down on you, but I didn't think for a second that I'd lose!\pThis is fantastic! You and your Pokémon are inspiring!\pKeep up that energy in your upcoming battles!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: Ah, you timed your arrival well. I've just finished reading a book, you see.\pI am {STR_VAR_1}. I am a user of Psychic types.
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: I'm afraid I will have to go all out against you to live up to my reputation.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: I see.\nYour power is real.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: I should warn you that there are far stronger battles that await you than I.\pRemain cautious.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: Together, you and your Pokémon overcame all the challenges you faced, however difficult.\pIt means you've triumphed over any personal weaknesses, too.\pBut that's enough talk. Let's get on with why you're here.
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: I, {STR_VAR_1}, accept your challenge!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Just a few minutes ago, you were the most powerful challenger.\pNow you have proven yourself as a much more powerful trainer than I.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: That was excellent. Truly, an outstanding battle.\pYou gave the support your Pokémon needed to maximize their power, and you guided them with certainty to secure victory.\pI'm certain that your battle prowess will take you far in your Adventure!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: What incredible luck for you--
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: You get to battle the best among of the three brothers!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Lose? Me?\nI don't believe this.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: Why, you're quite remarkable.\pYou're sure to go far!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: Ta-da! The Fire-type scorcher {STR_VAR_1}-- that's me--
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: will be your opponent!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: You got me.\nI am… burned… out…
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: Whoa ho! You're on fire!\pYou've for sure got this!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: Nothing personal… No hard feelings… Me and my Grass-type Pokémon will… um…
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: We're gonna battle, come what may.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Er…\nIs it over now?
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: …What a surprise.\pYou… are very strong.\pI wish the best of luck to you in your Adventure.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: Well then, challenger, I'm going to research…
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: How you battle with the Pokémon you've so lovingly raised!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: My theory about you was correct.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: You're more than just talented…\pYou're motivated! I salute you!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: My Bug Pokémon are scurrying with excitement about getting to battle you.
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Let's get straight to it!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Is it over?\nHas my muse abandoned me?
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: Aww… I lost.\pWhatever! Losing to you doesn't bug me because you are a-MAZ-ingly strong!\pI'm certain you'll reach your goal!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: Let's get right to it!
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: My beloved Pokémon will make your head spin!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: I meant to make your head spin, but you shocked me instead.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: My, oh my…\nYou have a sweet fighting style.\pBest of luck with the rest of your Adventure!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: Well…
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Think it's about time to see fer myself what yer skills are all about.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Well, I've had enough… And just so you know, I didn't go easy on you.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: Mrrrmph. I see. But I sure don't like it!\pFer such a young 'un, ya have an imposin' battle style.\pYou gotta live up to yer pontential now, yer hear!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: Hee-hee!\nI've been waiting for you.
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Let's battle as hard as we can!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Being your opponent in battle is a new source of strength to me. Thank you!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: My Pokémon and I are happy because for the first time in a while, we could fight with our full strength.\pYou're an amazing Pokémon Trainer!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: You appear ready to face me…\nThen…
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Bring it!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: The wonderful combination of you and your Pokémon!\pWhat a beautiful friendship!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: You possess an honorable and stout heart\pI wish you the best of luck in your Adventure!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: As a Trainer, I've simply been pursuing greater strength.\pBut what I'm searching for now is a young Trainer who can show me a bright future.
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Perhaps that trainer shall be you.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: This intense feeling that floods me after a defeat… I don't know how to describe it.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: Wonderful.\pI'm grateful we had a chance to meet and battle.\pGood luck to you in your upcoming battles.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: Get ready!
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: I'm gonna knock some sense outta ya!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Wait!\nI was right in the middle of the chorus!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: Sigh!\nWhat are you doing losing, Roxie?!\pWell…\nI guess that means you're strong!\pYou better not lose any of your other battles!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: Sup!\nYou look strong!
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Shoots! Let's start!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: You totally rocked that!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: You're raising some wicked Pokémon.\pYou got this Trainer thing down!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: I was inspired by the challenger who was just here, and somehow I got a little sad…\pExcuse me.\nYou're a challenger, right?
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: I, the Ghost-type Pokémon user, shall be your opponent.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Wow. I'm dumbstruck!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: I know a lot of words, but right now I can't figure out how to say this.\pPerhaps, if the feeling I'm having now is put into words, it will be trapped there.\pSo let me say this…\nMy feeling is you're a great Trainer!\pI'm sure you'll go far!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: It is my intention to test you-- to take you to the limits of your strength.
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Kiai!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: There is no single strongest Pokémon or sole best combination…\pThat's why it is difficult to keep winning.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: I think a heart that desires strength and strives to grow stronger is a precious ideal.\pThat is why I respect you-- because you have these things.\pYou are destined to go far!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: I, {STR_VAR_1}…
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Will fulfill my duty to be your opponent.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: A real warrior doesn't dash off in pursuit of the next victory, nor throw a fit when experiencing a loss.\pA real warrior ponders the next battle.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: Whether or not you get to fight at full strength, whether or not luck smiles on you-- none of that matters.\pOnly results matter. And a loss is a loss.\pIt would be wise to remember that in your upcoming battles.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: Who are you?\nHow impudent you are to disturb my sleep.
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Make your best effort not to bore me with a yawn-inducing battle. Clear?
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: As a Trainer, you are both excellent and elegant. Your Pokémon have class.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: I am very pleased to have battled you.\pYou'll certainly go far.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: Say Trainer…
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: How about a match with the strongest Trainer in the Unova region?
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: After the battle, a fresh wind blew through my heart…
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: Use the battle with me as a stepping stone and move forward!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: I've been waiting for this!\pI really look forward to having serious battles with strong Trainers!
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: OK! Brace yourself!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Aghhhh…\nI did my best, but we lost…
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: I'm upset I couldn't win!\pBut you know what? More than that, I'm happy!\pI mean, come on.\nBy having a serious battle, you and your Pokémon, and me and my Pokémon, we all got to know one another better than before!\pWhich is why I know you'll succeed in your future battles!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: Why do they call it oven when you of in the cold food of out hot eat the food!
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Todo
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Todo
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: Todo

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: What was that? A challenge?\pThen let us get started!
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: You better not underestimate me!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Woah! You're amazing!\nLet's do this again sometime!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: It's not going to get easier from here on out.\pI'll be rooting for you!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: Your willingness to adapt has brought you this far.
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Let us see who is the better strategist!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Seems RNG favored you this battle!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: This Pokémon League is always unpredictable.\pGood luck!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: I'll try to be gentle!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: I hope that helped!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: You look like a kid trying to meddle in stuff.\pNot on my watch!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: So strong…
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: You best keep out of the way!\pI won't hold back next time.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: We've got no room for snot nosed kids in Team Aqua!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: There's no way!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: You better not get in our way again, kid!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: The world needs more land!\pThere's no other way around that!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Don't be so stubborn!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: You'll change you're mind one day and then regret getting in our way!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: I've got no time for dumb looking kids getting in our way!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: You're still dumb.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: If you weren't dumb, you wouldn't be getting in our way!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: I hatched and rasied all of my Pokémon!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: I guess I need to work in my breeding technique…
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: My breeding technique still needs work I guess…

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Did you really raise all your Pokémon yourself?
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Wow! That was something else!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: You've done a great job raising your Pokémon!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Why are you looking at me like that?
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: It's rude to stare!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: It's rude to stare!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Eww… did you just look at me?
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Gross…
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: Can you just not…

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: My mind and my Pokémon are in sync!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: You and your Pokémon were more in sync, it seems.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: How did you train your Pokémon I wonder?\pLet me read you mind to find out!\p… … …\pThat makes no sense…\nYou're crazy.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Look at me go!\nI can destroy the world!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: It's not fun when you pretend too.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: You're a party pooper!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: I want to play a game!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: That was fun!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: Can we play another game?

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Ah!\pYou look like a strong trainer!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Ouch…
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: Yes you are strong.\pNot at strong as I was in my prime.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: SLOW DOWN!\pIT'S RUDE TO RUN!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: BE QUIET!\pIT'S RUDE TO SHOUT!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: IT'S RUDE TO STARE!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: It's all about the quality of your training!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Huh, I guess I need to train some more.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: Back to training for me, I guess.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Move out of the way!\pWhat are you doing!?
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Now that was just plain rude.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: Watch where you're going next time.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: I can't wait to use my technique from school!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: What! That technique was much better than mine!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: Why don't they teach us useful techniques in school.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: I lost my last battle so I'm gonna get payback on you!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Oh no!\nYou were suppose to lose!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: Why do I keep losing?

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: That's a neat Bag you've got there!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Still not as good as my Bag, though.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: Your Bag may be cool, but it's not even close to mine.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: My bird Pokémon are the strongest in the world!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: They're still the strongest in my world.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: Bird Pokémon are super cool, don't you think?!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: What do my little eyes spy?\pIs that… a Pokémon battle?!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: My little eyes did not spy this.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: I'll be honest… I'm not entirely sure how I spy works.\pDid I do it right?

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: I can knock down trees just by punching them!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: What? This can't be!?
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: You made me drop all the logs I picked up.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Fufufu!\pI always look forward to Pokémon battles.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: That was it!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: Maybe we can battle again sometime?\pFufufu.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Stop right there!\pYou were about to step on a precious sample!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Oh wait…\nThat's just a rock.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: My bad, I thought that was a precious sample.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Ha!\pI'm on a streak and I'm not planning on ending it here!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Well, I didn't plan on ending it here…
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: Time to build it up from scratch again, I guess.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: I bought myself the most powerful Pokémon imaginable!\pYou don't stand a chance!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: What!?!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: I spent so much on these useless Pokémon too.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Me and my precious Bug Pokémon are on our way to fight a GYM!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: I guess we're not quite ready yet.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: I love Bug Pokémon with all my heart!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: You look very capable!\pWould you mind entertaining my Pokémon in a battle?
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Astounding!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: You have done a remarkable job raising up your Pokémon!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: I was just on my way home after a great haul!\pI guess I can battle you too!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Well that was a bit of shame.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: I should've just taken my haul and gone home.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: You better not wipe my run!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: I was in the middle of a Quest too…
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: Why?\pI've been grinding this out for like 6 months…
